metadata.synopsis: Player comments on some slag they just found while exploring the forge area. They notice a glimmer, and might be able to identify it as Adamantine.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Collect some Adamantine in Ketheric City

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Are those... specks of adamantine in this slag?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Not much use for this slag. Nice speckles, though.
